post.text:
citation令人头大…………
求教那种没有作者的网页新闻文章（BBC news之类的），如何用APA进行规范的引用？是把新闻机构的名字放到Author的位置，还是把文章标题直接放到开头并且标为斜体？
即，以下四种，哪种是正确的？
1. Elon Musk reaches deal over tweets about taking Tesla private (2018, September 30). *BBC*. Retrieved from https://www.bbc.com/news/business-45696150
2. *Elon Musk reaches deal over tweets about taking Tesla private* (2018, September 30). *BBC*. Retrieved from https://www.bbc.com/news/business-45696150
3. BBC News. (2018, September 30). *Elon Musk reaches deal over tweets about taking Tesla private*. https://www.bbc.com/news/business-45696150
4. BBC. (2018, September 30). *Elon Musk reaches deal over tweets about taking Tesla private*. BBC News. https://www.bbc.com/news/business-45696150.
